description.en:
Predict is the first trending prediction platform based on the mining-driven mode. It initiates the deflation mode and provides the service of the price trending prediction of BTC, ETH, etc. More prediction scenarios will be supported in the future.
Predict Token (PT) is the platform Token issued by Predict. Its total volume is 1 billion, with 50% for community mining, 20% for PT Fund, 10% for team, 10% for private sale, 5% for strategic partners and 5 % for DragonEx Institute.
